courseDescription:
There are multiple types of processes that manufacturers can use to create products. Manufacturing Processes - Metalworking is a free online course that will teach you about different types of metalworking processes that occur in manufacturing. This course illustrates the need for torque and power consumption in the rolling process as well as extrusion/wire drawing processes. You will gain an understanding of shearing operations as well as dies and punches. 

This course begins by introducing you to plastic deformation based processes (hot working, cold working). You will learn about the various types of presses used in metalworking processes and the types of forging processes. Furthermore, you will learn about the torque and power consumption required in the rolling process as well as extrusion and wire drawing processes. Lastly, you will learn about the different stresses induced in sheet metals as well as clearance in the shearing process.

This free online course will give you an in-depth understanding of metalworking  processes involved in the manufacturing of goods. You will learn about the importance of achieving the desired size, shape, and properties of a product through the various types of presses, forging processes as well as extrusion and wire drawing processes. This course will be of great interest to individuals with an interest in the automobile industry and the aviation industry. Start this free course today and learn about metalworking processes.
